name: Doors (itch) (loui4)
description:
Doors By Louis Hobson

This is my entry for olc game jam :). I came up with the idea halfway into coding it so idk how that works. I interpreted the theme slightly differently.  Instead of being set outdoors in the wild and stuff, it is actually set around doors. You have to go through doors, and come *out doors*. What can I say I thought it was pretty smart myself.  The coding is done in pure Js making use of the ctx, which lets me draw images on the html5 canvas. Anyway there are a few levels, I drew the graphics in a legitimate version of Photoshop (it actually was), and recorded the music with audacity through my windows 7 quality laptop microphone (so you might wanna mute it :D) This is my first game jam, so pretty excited ngl.

Hope you enjoy it (let alone play it lol :)

======================================

Arrow Keys to Move

Click on the game and Press Enter to begin!
